title: Changing name on Typophile
content:
Good afternoon!  
Well i’ve changed some stuff and now i want to change my username here... youremin no longer exists. How may i do that? Who should i contact?

 [‹ Alfredo Heavy or Alexuss Heavy?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122034824/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47770 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pair with Neo Sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122034824/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47761 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joelsantos

comments.content:
Click on ’My account’ at the right. Click on ’Edit’. Click on ’Additional Information’.

There you will see your user name. Change it. Save.

Almost, William. There, you can ‘only’ change your _full_ name . For a change of the _user_ name, TTFKAY has to contact a moderator. Who’s a moderator? Check the [Read Me](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122034824/http:/www.typophile.com/readme) page.
Ah, at one time you could do it yourself, but I guess that’s changed.

Yes, sometime ago there was something to change even the subdomain but now...  
which of the moderators should i contact?
